caseTitle: M/s Islamabad Electric Supply Company Limited (IESCO) through its Finance Director Islamabad v. The Appellate Tribunal Inland Revenue (Headquarter), Islamabad through its Chairman Islamabad and others
tagline: Discussion: (1) Section 124, 160, 161, 165, 177 & 205 of the Income Tax Ordinance 2001. (2) Action under Section 161 of the Ordinance is not contingent upon the compliance of pre-audit requirements as mentioned under Section 177. (3) The intention of the legislature must be discovered from the words used.
